doc.after: Arkham City features a large ensemble cast of characters from the history of Batman comics. Returning characters from Arkham Asylum include Batman (Kevin Conroy),[49] the Joker (Mark Hamill)âin what Hamill stated would be his final time voicing the character[50]âWarden-turned-Mayor Quincy Sharp (Tom Kane), police Commissioner James Gordon (David Kaye),[51] and reporter Jack Ryder (James Horan).[52] Returning villains include the Riddler (Wally Wingert),[53] Victor Zsasz (Danny Jacobs),[43][52] Bane (Fred Tatasciore),[54][55] and Poison Ivy (Tasia Valenza)[55][56] Joker's sidekick Harley Quinn also returns, voiced by Tara Strong, who replaces Arleen Sorkin.[52] Batman's supporting cast introduces Catwoman (Grey DeLisle),[57] Robin (Troy Baker),[42][58] and Batman's butler Alfred Pennyworth (Martin Jarvis),[51] who provides radio support alongside the returning Oracle (Kimberly Brooks).[51] Nightwing appears as a playable character outside of the main story via challenge maps.[59]
